yarn add @babel/core @babel/preset-env @babel/cli @babel/preset-react -D

// add no package.json, scripts
"build": "babel src -d build"

yarn add react@^17.0.2 react-dom@^17.0.2

yarn add webpack webpack-cli -D
command: yarn webpack 

// generate hash
yarn add html-webpack-plugin -D

//clean new generated files
yarn add clean-webpack-plugin -D

// loader 
yarn add babel-loader -D

// webserver
yarn add webpack-dev-server -D

//link: https://webpack.js.org/loaders/babel-loader
yarn add -D babel-loader @babel/core @babel/preset-env webpack

//types on props
yarn add prop-types -D

//css loader
yarn add -D css-loader style-loader

//sass loader
yarn add -D sass-loader sass

//install styled-components
yarn add styled-components

//yarn add react-router-dom@5.3.0

yarn add react-spring
